column4: i'm having a bit of trouble finding information about memory inside this machine i'm booting from LiveCD with.. i'm inside Device Manager but can't figure out which one shows installed memory amount.. can anyone offer a tip?
i'm speaking of RAM not HDD space
so if it says 483480KB under MemTotal, that means I have almost 512MB installed usable memory right?
i could just open the box but that's too easy
it was a freebee machine at one of my clients so i'm throwing 7.04 on it
512MB is plenty enough for an extra desktop w/ ubuntu
ah thanks.. i've been working on socket 939 for so long, i forgot what intel's like
same here -- my replacement under warranty came back Intel :(
Theunor: are you serious?!  they must have changed out the mobo too
that to me seems a bit over the line
yeah, turned out both mobo and processor were busted
